Articles.Content:
The V-1 stands for Vergeltungswaffe (vengeance weapon, Thanks Wikipedia!), and it was used to rain destruction of the "east end of ol' Londahn Tahn."

FYI, I haven't done an actual rail launch system as I don't have the expertise.

The foolish Kerbtownese have betrayed us for the last time! We must rain fire and destruction onto them.

We have scrapped all our weapons since we put down the last time the Race tried to Subjugate us. But we have one last K-1 Boombug flying bomb. It has a range to go to KSC 2. The flight path goes as follows, launch, via the SRB rail system, then the drone flies up to the cruise height of 4 km, then when it reaches the target, the rocket engines activate so that they can ram into it at terminal velocity, then BOOM!

LINK: https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B13W1Qcyhbc5LURqY1JSbHlRczQ/edit?usp=sharing
